title: Donald Trump Asks Supreme Court to Delay TikTok Ban
description: In an amicus brief, the president-elect asked the court to push back the Jan. 19 deadline for ByteDance to divest from the app while his administration "considers the merits of this case."

description: Universal Music Group (UMG) and Amazon Music have jointly announced a renewed worldwide licensing agreement today (December 23).
